about_the_game: Death in Sands is an action RPG with a top-down view in which you need to fight enemies, search for better weapons and gear, as well as food, various medicinal and psychotropic plants that will allow you to fight more effectively or at least simply survive in harsh conditions of dungeons and ruins filled with bloodthirsty creatures and cultists who desire only your death, and maybe even something worse...
